request_text: show net income trend with outlier detection

policy_decision.reason: Low sensitivity data allowed for all authenticated roles

sql.final_sql: SELECT quarter, SUM(net_income) AS net_income_sum FROM dp_call_reports WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY quarter HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 ORDER BY quarter
sql.canonical_sql: SELECT QUARTER, SUM(NET_INCOME) AS NET_INCOME_SUM FROM DP_CALL_REPORTS WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY QUARTER HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 ORDER BY QUARTER
